Paragraph: For identifying the reason for high crystallinity of the copolymers , the density functional theory ( DFT ) calculation for the minimum energy conformations of the copolymers was performed to reveal the difference of the dihedral angle between the TA and DPP units in the copolymers.

| between the TA and DPP units |

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material property" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name".

| difference of the dihedral angle |
| between TA and DPP units |

Note: "copolymers" is a type of material, so it is included as a property name. "DFT calculation" is a method used to determine the properties of the material, so it is not included as a property name.
